figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-poster combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left

div.p: All administrative staff are available by phone and email; they will be available remotely and will respond to your inquiries and concerns in a timely manner. Teaching staff are available to their assigned students in their online classroom, by email, or by other means as indicated by the individual teacher. Important phone numbers are below:

KaBao Xiong
kbxiong@stpaulcityschool.org
651-225-9177
Available: 8am-3pm
Language: English, Hmoob

Jazmine Compton
jcompton@stpaulcityschool.org
651-225-9177
Available: 8am-3pm
Language: English
All SPCS Primary and Middle School staff will be available at their phone extensions listed on the Our Team pages.
River’s Edge Academy staff will be available by email and remote phone numbers, listed below.

tr.td: Dean of School Culture and Behavior

div.p: If you have any questions, concerns, or comments about the school closure, distance learning, or communications related to COVID-19, you may submit them here. You may fill out the form in the language you are most comfortable with.

div.label:
Preferred mode of contact for response
*
